titleStmt.title: SII 7.107: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 107. (A.R. No. 97 of 1900). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . komāṟapaṉmar tribhuvaṉaccakravat=tikaḷ śrīsundarapāṇḍyadevaṟku yāṇṭu
paṉṉiraṇṭāvatu Uṭaiyār tiruvottūruṭaiyanāyaṉār tirumuṉpu muṉṉāḷ Iṭun tirunantāviḷakku naṉ
tirunāmattukkāṇiyāṉa Aṉukkāvūr nilam Oruvelikku viḷakku Iraṇṭum viḻānallūr nilam Araivelik
ku viḷakku Oṉṟum ceṅkāṭu nilam Oṉṟukku viḷakku Iraṇṭum Iruṅkalai nilam Oruvelikku viḷakku Iraṇṭu
m nāval nilam Oṉṟukku viḷakku Iraṇṭum vāṭkuṭai nilam Araivelikku viḷakku Oṉṟum taviciperumpākkam
Araivelikku viḷakku Oṉṟum toḻuppeṭunilam Oṉṟukku viḷakku Iraṇṭum vaḷḷainilam Oṉṟukku
viḷakku Iraṇṭum perumpālai nilam Oṉṟukku viḷakku Iraṇṭum veṇkuṉṟam nilam Oṉṟukku viḷakku
Iraṇṭum kuṭanakar nilam Araivelikku viḷakku Oṉṟum putuppākkam nilam Oṉṟukku viḷakku Iraṇṭum veḷiya
ṉūr nilam Oṉṟukku viḷakku Iraṇṭum kāḻuyūr nilam Araivelikku viḷakku Oṉṟum Āḷappiṟantaviḷākam nilam
Oruvelikku viḷakku Iraṇṭum maṭṭainilam Araivelikku viḷakku viḷakku Oṉṟum Āka Ivvūrkaḷāl nilam pa
tiṉālum Iḷamulainācciyār tirumuṉpu Iṭum viḷakku Eṭṭukku pārācūr naṅkittaccaṉ tāṅkaluṭaṉ kūṭiṉa
nilam nāluveliyum Āka nilam patiṉeṭṭu veliyiṉāl Iṭum tirunantāviḷakku muppattuĀṟum niṅkalāka Iv
vāṇṭai Āvaṇimātammutal nāṟpatu tirunantāviḷakku Iṭakkaṭavatākavum Ittirunantāviḷakku nāṟpa
tukkum tiruviḷakkuppuṟamāka tirunāmattukkāṇiyāṉa tevatāṉam taccaṉtāṅkalāṉa ve
taviṉotanallūruñ cirāyampaṭṭum nāṟpāṟkellaikku Uṭpaṭṭa naṉcey puṉcey
kaṭamai Āyam Uḷḷiṭṭa palanellāyaṅkaḷum poṉvari kācukaṭamai Uḷḷiṭṭa pala kā
cāyaṅkaḷum taṟiIṟai taṭṭārpāṭṭam Ūrkkaṇakkarkācu potumakkaḷperkkaṭamai ce
ṭṭikaḷ vāṇikarperkkaṭamai cekkiṟai māvaṭai kuḷavaṭai nāṭṭuvari nāṭṭuviṉi
yokam maṟṟum Ivvūrkaḷai nokkivarum Epperppaṭṭa Upātikaḷum varikaḷum Uṭpaṭa
mutalaṭaṅka Iṟaiyiliyākak kuṭutteṉ viracampanāyaṉāṉa campuvarāyaṉeṉ
Ippaṭi Ittaccaṉtāṅkalum cirāyampaṭṭum tāṅkaḷe Uḻavum veṇṭuvārkku
Aṭaittu Aṉupavittukkoṇṭu candrādittavaraiyum Ittirunantāviḷakku nāṟpatu
m Iṭuvate Itu panmāheśvara rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 7.107 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
